The Science & Story Behind It

The success of ‘Dual-Bite’ lies in its balanced selection for both ornamental traits and productive characteristics.

  • The intense red coloration is a result of selective breeding for maximum astaxanthin expression and uniform pigment distribution, a trait that also indicates a robust immune system and high-quality diet.
  • The larger body size and rapid growth are achieved by selecting for individuals with efficient nutrient partitioning and a slightly longer growth period before sexual maturity.
  • Its prolific breeding rate is a cornerstone of its utility; selecting for high fecundity and strong maternal instincts ensures a constant population turnover, allowing for regular harvests while maintaining the cleaning crew.

In short, Red-Cherry Shrimp ‘Dual-Bite’ is a prolific, efficient, and flavor-concentrated micro-livestock, the ultimate multi-purpose organism for the urban aquaponic system, transforming waste into beauty and bite-sized gourmet treats.
